name: Silver SAML Attack Relationship Diagram
description: Visualization of the relationships between Silver SAML attack pattern, vulnerabilities, courses of action, indicators, and platform solutions.
content:
graph TD
    A["Attack Pattern: Silver SAML"] --> B["Vulnerability: External Certificate Import"]
    A --> C["Vulnerability: SAML Design Limitations"]
    A --> D["Vulnerability: Key Vault Access Control"]
    
    E["Course of Action: Use Built-in Certificates"] --> B
    F["Course of Action: Migrate to OIDC"] --> C
    G["Course of Action: Implement Strict Access Controls"] --> D
    
    H["Indicator: Certificate Change Events"] --> A
    I["Indicator: Unusual SAML Authentication Patterns"] --> A
    
    J["Platform Solution: Enhanced Certificate Validation"] --> A
    K["Platform Solution: Strong Identity Binding"] --> A
    L["Platform Solution: Advanced Federation Security"] --> A
    
    style A fill:#ff9999
    style B fill:#ffcc99
    style C fill:#ffcc99
    style D fill:#ffcc99
    style E fill:#99ff99
    style F fill:#99ff99
    style G fill:#99ff99
    style H fill:#9999ff
    style I fill:#9999ff
    style J fill:#ffff99
    style K fill:#ffff99
    style L fill:#ffff99
